channel.title: [317/Delta] Highscores list Problem
channel.description: Whenever I try to view someones personal stats it changes to localhost and won't let me. How do I make it so it stays as http://MYIP/ rather than changing to http://localhost/. Go to my page at http://64.186.131.133/highscores/highscores.php and you'll see what i'm talkin about. Help?

item.title: [317/Delta] Highscores list Problem
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:4, topic:350642”]Creating a new topic was faster than hitting the reply button?
You also need to edit localhost in mysql.php with the exception of the first localhost
Dont change mysql_connect(‘localhost’, ‘root’, ‘PASSWORD’);[/quote]
That was where my problem was, all better now

Read full topic

item.title: [317/Delta] Highscores list Problem
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Creating a new topic was faster than hitting the reply button?
You also need to edit localhost in mysql.php with the exception of the first localhost
Dont change mysql_connect(‘localhost’, ‘root’, ‘PASSWORD’);

Read full topic

item.title: [317/Delta] Highscores list Problem
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

deathschaos9:

You should have posted in the thread instead of making a new topic. At any rate, you just need to change all instances of localhost to your IP. In functions.php, highscores.php, personal.php and skills.php

i coulda sword i did that
but ill double check
and sorry it was just faster this way

Read full topic
